title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Theory and practical explanation of nitrogen liquefier: MNP 12; Description and Demonstration of parts/accessories of nitrogen liquefier: MNP 12; Liquid nitrogen plant operation, measurement of production rate, purity and power consumption: MNP 12; Theory and practical explanation of nitrogen liquefier: PLN-106; Description and Demonstration of parts/accessories of nitrogen liquefier: PLN-106; Theory and demonstration of Water Chilling Plant; Theory and demonstration of Cooling Tower; Vacuum Insulation of Dewars, theory, demonstration and re-evacuation of Dewars; Theory and demonstration of operation of Cryogenic valves and transfer devices; Theory, demonstration and operation of Air/Gas compressor and accessories; Theory of CryoFreezing and demonstration of Cryo-freezer
